text:
Coforge Launches EvolveOps.AI: Agentic AI-Powered IT Operations Platform
Coforge has launched EvolveOps.AI, a comprehensive Agentic AI-powered IT operations platform built on open-source technologies with 28 specialized AI personas for autonomous enterprise operations. The platform delivers substantial performance improvements including 25% reduction in system downtime, 40% decrease in IT operational expenses, and 60% faster incident detection and resolution, while supporting seamless integration across major cloud platforms and existing IT infrastructure.
*this image is generated using AI for illustrative purposes only.
 Coforge has announced the launch of EvolveOps.AI, a next-generation Agentic AI-powered IT operations management platform designed to empower enterprises for an AI-first era. The platform leverages purpose-built hybrid cloud architecture and agentic operations to deliver agility, resilience, and transformation across enterprise systems.
Platform Architecture and Capabilities
EvolveOps.AI is built entirely on open-source technologies and can be deployed quickly using a large repository of pre-built adaptors, plug-ins, a fine-tuned purpose-built small language model, and agentic AI resolver personas. The platform combines the power of fine-tuned Small Language Models (SLMs) with proven deterministic models to deliver superior performance across IT operations.
| Feature | Details |
|---|---|
| AI Personas | 28 specialized agentic personas |
| Architecture | Open-source hybrid cloud platform |
| Integration | Seamless with leading hyperscalers |
| Deployment | Quick setup with pre-built adaptors |
AI-Powered Operational Excellence
The platform incorporates 28 agentic personas performing various tasks across the IT operations lifecycle, including SRE agents, Infrastructure Cloud Engineering Agents, Network Engineering Agents, Kubernetes Engineering Agents, Command Center Engineering Agents, Service Management Agents, and FinOps Agents. These AI agents can analyze, reason, decide, and act across various complex IT scenarios with robust guardrails allowing enterprises to toggle from human-in-the-loop mode to truly autonomous operations.
Performance Improvements
Coforge has documented significant performance improvements achieved by enterprises implementing EvolveOps.AI:
| Performance Metric | Improvement |
|---|---|
| System Downtime Reduction | 25% |
| IT Operational Expenses | 40% reduction |
| Mean Time to Detection | 60% reduction |
| Mean Time to Resolution | 60% reduction |
| Time to Market | 40% faster |
Strategic Vision and Market Position
According to Ashish Kumar, Global Business Unit Head - Cloud, AI-Infra, Security & ServiceNow at Coforge, the platform operationalizes the company's Mission Zero strategy: "Zero Disruption, Zero Touch, Zero Friction" for every cloud transformation. EvolveOps.AI helps clients shift from reactive firefighting to proactive, autonomous operations, delivering higher resilience, improved developer productivity, and superior experience for business users and customers.
Integration and Compatibility
EvolveOps.AI has been architected for seamless integration with industry-leading hyperscalers and enterprise IT Operations Management platforms. Its Hybrid Cloud Manager module supports full-stack builds and policy-driven automation across Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI), and private cloud environments, while interfacing with observability, ITSM, security, and automation tools.
